page.title: 20CONCLUSION
page.content: The information on the previous pages was jointly prepared by the pupils of primary 7, Brediland Primary, Paisley and first year of St Aelred's High School. We would also like to thank the various members of the Glenburn and Foxbar community without whose co-operation the project would not have been possible. All staff, pupils and members of the community who took part in the survey felt that it was a rewarding and worthwhile exercise. We hope that the information herein will be of interest to anyone using this disc in the future.
